title: The Year of the wildebeeste
brief_description: An extraordinary documentary of a herd on one million wildebeests on their annual epic two thousand mile migration in Kenya in search of grain and water during the dry summer months. Immense herd of antelope, zebra, giraffe and buffalo accompany them. Narrator: James Mason.
